alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hanover; Eastern King William; Eastern King and Queen; New Kent; Western King William; Western King and Queen (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 6:48PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central King and Queen, western New Kent, southeastern Hanover and King William Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 647 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms over Tunstall, or 7 miles west of King William, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibilty and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Tunstall around 710 PM EDT. King William around 715 PM EDT. New Kent and Talleysville around 745 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Enfield, Wrights Corner, Central Garage, Mountcastle, Orapax Farms, Upshaw, Cohoke, Walkerton, Westwood and Rose Garden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hanover; Eastern King William; Eastern King and Queen; New Kent; Western King William; Western King and Queen
